Package org.example.app.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
org.example.app.controller.Controller
@RestController public class Controller extends Object
This class defines a REST controller for managing customer data.

  • Method Details

    • createCustomer

      @PostMapping public Long createCustomer(@RequestBody Customer customer)
      Creates a new customer and saves them to the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer object to be created.
      Returns:
      The ID of the created customer.

    • getCustomerById

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Customer> getCustomerById(@RequestParam long id)
      Retrieves a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the customer information if found, or a 404 error if not found.

    • editCustomer

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> editCustomer(@RequestBody Customer customer)
      Edits an existing customer's information.
      Parameters:
      customer - The updated customer object.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the ID of the modified customer if successful, or a 404 error if customer not found.

    • deleteCustomer

      @DeleteMapping public void deleteCustomer(@RequestParam long id)
      Deletes a customer by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer to be deleted.
